description.zh-cn: 一份在香港发行的中文报纸，由查良镛（金庸）和沈宝新于1959年创办。
description.en: A Chinese-language newspaper published in Hong Kong, founded in 1959 by Louis Cha (Jin Yong) and Shen Pao Sing.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名武侠小说作家，以笔名“金庸”闻名，《明报》的共同创办人。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong wuxia novelist, famous under the pen name 'Jin Yong', and the co-founder of Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》的共同创办人。
description.en: Co-founder of Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 拥有《明报》的上市公司。
description.en: The listed company that owns Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 香港一份亲北京的报纸，曾在1960年代与《明报》展开笔战。
description.en: A pro-Beijing newspaper in Hong Kong that engaged in a 'pen war' with Ming Pao in the 1960s.

description.zh-cn: 香港一份亲北京的报纸，曾在1960年代参与围攻《明报》。
description.en: A pro-Beijing newspaper in Hong Kong that participated in attacking Ming Pao in the 1960s.

description.zh-cn: 1967年由香港左派团体发起的反对港英政府的暴动。《明报》因持反对立场而受到威胁。
description.en: The 1967 Hong Kong leftist riots were a series of disturbances against the British Hong Kong government, initiated by local pro-communist groups. Ming Pao faced threats for its opposition stance.

description.zh-cn: “港九各界同胞反对港英迫害斗争委员会”的简称，是六七暴动的领导组织。
description.en: The short name for the "Committee of Hong Kong and Kowloon Compatriots for the Struggle Against British Hong Kong Persecution," the leading organization of the 1967 riots.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

description.zh-cn: 负责起草《香港特别行政区基本法》的机构，查良镛曾是其成员。
description.en: The body responsible for drafting the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, of which Louis Cha was a member.

description.zh-cn: 由查良镛和查济民提出的关于香港政治体制发展的保守方案，曾引发巨大争议。
description.en: A conservative proposal on Hong Kong's political development put forward by Louis Cha and Cha Chi-ming, which sparked significant controversy.

description.zh-cn: 香港企业家，与查良镛共同提出“双查方案”。
description.en: A Hong Kong entrepreneur who jointly proposed the 'Double Cha Proposal' with Louis Cha.

description.zh-cn: 香港作家，曾在《明报》撰写专栏，并发表文章严厉批评时任特首董建华。
description.en: A Hong Kong writer who had a column in Ming Pao and published an article severely criticizing then-Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区首任行政长官。
description.en: The first Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 2019年在香港发生的大规模社会运动。《明报》一篇相关社评曾引发内部争议。
description.en: A large-scale social movement that occurred in Hong Kong in 2019. An editorial by Ming Pao on the topic caused internal controversy.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》记者，1993年在北京进行采访活动时被捕，后被判刑。
description.en: A Ming Pao journalist who was arrested in 1993 while reporting in Beijing and subsequently sentenced to prison.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部在北京市的分支机构，负责执行逮捕《明报》记者席扬。
description.en: The Beijing branch of the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the arrest of Ming Pao journalist Xi Yang.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》前总编辑，2014年遭人持刀袭击受重伤。
description.en: Former chief editor of Ming Pao who was seriously injured in a knife attack in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》前总编辑刘进图遭两名骑摩托车男子持刀袭击，身中六刀，事件引起社会广泛关注。
description.en: Former Ming Pao chief editor Kevin Lau was attacked by two men on a motorcycle and stabbed six times, an incident that drew widespread public concern.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治漫画家，其在《明报》连载40年的专栏于2023年被停刊。
description.en: A Hong Kong political cartoonist whose column in Ming Pao, which ran for 40 years, was suspended in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府部门，曾多次点名批评《尊子漫画》。
description.en: A bureau of the HKSAR Government that publicly criticized Zunzi's cartoons on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国外交部长，其“核裤论”曾引发《明报》的批评。
description.en: Former Foreign Minister of the People's Republic of China, whose 'nuclear weapons over pants' theory drew criticism from Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 曾任新华社主管，其批评使得左派报章停止了对《明报》的论战。
description.en: Former head of Xinhua News Agency, whose criticism led leftist newspapers to cease their polemics against Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 香港商业电台节目主持人，在六七暴动期间因谴责左派暴力而被杀害。
description.en: A Commercial Radio Hong Kong host who was assassinated during the 1967 riots for denouncing leftist violence.

description.zh-cn: 香港的新闻工作者工会组织。
description.en: A trade union for journalists in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》前总编辑。
description.en: Former chief editor of Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》前执行总编辑，笔名安裕，2016年被解雇。
description.en: Former executive chief editor of Ming Pao, pen name On Yu, who was dismissed in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 香港时事评论员，其在《明报》的专栏在被港府多次批评后于2022年底停刊。
description.en: A Hong Kong current affairs commentator whose column in Ming Pao was discontinued in late 2022 after repeated criticism from the Hong Kong government.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的决策局之一，曾点名批评《明报》刊登的评论文章。
description.en: One of the policy bureaus of the HKSAR Government, which publicly criticized a commentary published in Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生于中国北京的政治事件，对查良镛的政治立场及《明报》的编辑方针产生影响。
description.en: A political event that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, which influenced the political stance of Louis Cha and the editorial policy of Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 香港中文大学的学生刊物，其刊登的“情色问卷”曾引发社会争议，《明报》因转载其内容而被送检。
description.en: A student publication of The Chinese University of Hong Kong. Its publication of a 'sexuality survey' caused public controversy, and Ming Pao was referred to a tribunal for reprinting its content.

description.zh-cn: 香港司法机构之一，负责裁定物品是否属于淫亵或不雅。曾将转载“情色问卷”的《明报》评为不雅。
description.en: A tribunal within the Hong Kong Judiciary responsible for classifying articles as obscene or indecent. It once rated an issue of Ming Pao that reprinted a 'sexuality survey' as indecent.

description.zh-cn: 香港的法院之一。在司法覆核案中裁定淫亵物品审裁处对《明报》的评级违例。
description.en: One of the courts in Hong Kong. It ruled in a judicial review case that the Obscene Articles Tribunal's classification of Ming Pao was unlawful.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》由世界华文媒体所拥有。
description.en: Ming Pao is owned by Media Chinese International.

description.zh-cn: 因“核裤论”等议题，《明报》与《大公报》展开激烈笔战。
description.en: Ming Pao and Ta Kung Pao engaged in a fierce 'pen war' over issues such as the 'nuclear weapons over pants' theory.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》发表社评《要裤子不要核子》，公开反对时任中国外长陈毅提出的“当了裤子也要造核子”的言论。
description.en: Ming Pao published an editorial titled 'Pants, Not Nukes', openly opposing the statement 'We will have nuclear weapons even if we have to go without pants' made by then-Chinese Foreign Minister Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 批评了包括《大公报》在内的左派报章在“核裤论”论战中的表现，促使它们停止对《明报》的攻击。
description.en: He criticized the performance of leftist newspapers, including Ta Kung Pao, in the 'nuclear weapons over pants' debate, prompting them to cease their attacks on Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 在六七暴动期间，《明报》支持港府止暴制乱，并发表社论批评组织骚乱的斗委会。
description.en: During the 1967 riots, Ming Pao supported the Hong Kong government's efforts to quell the violence and published editorials criticizing the Struggle Committee that organized the disturbances.

description.zh-cn: 因反对左派在六七暴动中的立场，社长查良镛被列入暗杀名单，并被迫短暂离开香港避难。
description.en: Due to his opposition to the leftist stance during the 1967 riots, publisher Louis Cha was placed on an assassination list and forced to temporarily leave Hong Kong for safety.

description.zh-cn: 在六七暴动期间，商业电台主持人林彬因谴责左派暴力行为而被纵火杀害。
description.en: During the 1967 riots, Commercial Radio host Lam Bun was murdered in an arson attack for denouncing leftist violence.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

position.zh-cn: 港方成员、政制小组港方召集人
position.en: Hong Kong member, Hong Kong co-convener of the political structure subgroup

description.zh-cn: 《明报》发表多篇社评及评论文章为“双查方案”进行辩护。
description.en: Ming Pao published multiple editorials and commentaries defending the 'Double Cha Proposal'.

description.zh-cn: 就《明报》对“双查方案”的报道手法发表声明，指责查良镛干预采访并要求其辞职。
description.en: Issued a statement regarding Ming Pao's coverage of the 'Double Cha Proposal', accusing Louis Cha of interfering with reporting and demanding his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 在《明报》专栏发表题为《下台吧 董建华》的文章，严厉抨击时任行政长官董建华的施政。
description.en: Published an article in his Ming Pao column titled 'Step Down, Tung Chee-hwa', severely criticizing the governance of then-Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa.

relationships.source: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 《明报》一篇将示威定性为“暴动”的社评，引发了内部员工和翻译员的公开抗议，损害了报社的内部和谐。
description.en: An editorial in Ming Pao that characterized the protests as a 'riot' triggered public protests from its own staff and translators, damaging internal harmony at the newspaper.

description.zh-cn: 以“从事非法窃取、刺探国家机密活动”为由拘捕并导致《明报》记者席扬被判刑。
description.en: Arrested Ming Pao journalist Xi Yang on charges of 'illegally stealing and prying into state secrets', leading to his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 《明报》前总编辑刘进图遭人持刀袭击，身受重伤。
description.en: Former Ming Pao chief editor Kevin Lau was attacked with a knife, suffering serious injuries.

description.zh-cn: 点名谴责《尊子漫画》“扭曲并抹黑”政府，此举是导致其专栏被停刊的直接原因之一。
description.en: Publicly condemned Zunzi's cartoon for 'distorting and smearing' the government, which was a direct factor leading to the suspension of his column.

description.zh-cn: 在漫画内容受到政府部门多次批评后，《明报》宣布停止刊登《尊子漫画》。
description.en: After the cartoon's content was repeatedly criticized by government departments, Ming Pao announced it would cease publishing Zunzi's cartoons.

description.zh-cn: 点名批评曾志豪在《明报》发表的关于“白纸运动”的评论混淆视听。
description.en: Publicly criticized a commentary by Tsang Chi-ho published in Ming Pao regarding the 'White Paper Protests' as misleading.

description.zh-cn: 点名批评曾志豪在《明报》发表的关于“安心出行”及Google的评论偏颇，最终导致其专栏被停。
description.en: Publicly criticized a commentary by Tsang Chi-ho in Ming Pao about 'LeaveHomeSafe' and Google as biased, eventually leading to the discontinuation of his column.

description.zh-cn: 在曾志豪的评论文章多次受到政府点名批评后，《明报》停止刊登其专栏。
description.en: After Tsang Chi-ho's commentary articles were repeatedly criticized by the government, Ming Pao ceased publishing his column.

description.zh-cn: 以“节流紧缩”为由，宣布裁退执行总编辑姜国元。
description.en: Announced the dismissal of Executive Chief Editor Keung Kwok-yuen, citing the need for 'cost-cutting and retrenchment'.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任《明报》总编辑，于2014年卸任。
description.en: Served as Chief Editor of Ming Pao, stepping down in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 因转载《中大学生报》的“情色问卷”，将《明报》副刊《星期日生活》暂定评为二级不雅物品。
description.en: Temporarily classified Ming Pao's Sunday supplement as a Class II indecent article for reprinting the 'sexuality survey' from The Chinese University Student Press.

description.zh-cn: 因刊登“情色问卷”，被淫亵物品审裁处暂定评为二级不雅物品。
description.en: Was temporarily classified as a Class II indecent article by the Obscene Articles Tribunal for publishing a 'sexuality survey'.

description.zh-cn: 在《明报》提出的司法覆核案中，裁定淫亵物品审裁处早前的评级违例，推翻其决定。
description.en: In a judicial review case filed by Ming Pao, the High Court ruled that the Obscene Articles Tribunal's earlier classification was unlawful, overturning its decision.

description.zh-cn: 查良镛因对六四事件感到伤心而退出政坛。
description.en: Louis Cha withdrew from politics due to his distress over the Tiananmen Square incident.

description.zh-cn: 时任总编辑钟天祥将《明报》原定关于六四事件的头条新闻更换为其他内容，此举被视为对敏感议题的审查。
description.en: Then-chief editor Chong Tien-siong replaced Ming Pao's planned headline story about the Tiananmen Square incident with other content, an act seen as censorship of a sensitive topic.
